ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Snare changes
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, it works the same as always for anyone under level 38.  But at level 38 it used to stop mobs at 50% health instead of 30% (which is what it does from 23
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it works the same as always for anyone under level 38. But at level 38
it used to stop mobs at 50% health instead of 30% (which is what it does
from 23 to 38). Now it is 30% even after 38.

Now, I would be willing to admit to the possibility that the 50% speed
reduction after level 38 may have been an unintended bug but.... to change
it without telling us... ouchie

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Daryl Schwemley" <drs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 9:06 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Snare changes


> After playing last night, I have determined that the level 23 song still

mobs
